All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscoveryContext<String>, javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver<DiscoveryContext<String>>
@Provider
public class StringDiscoveryContext
extends Object
implements DiscoveryContext<String>, javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver<DiscoveryContext<String>>

For convenience, a version of DiscoveryContext that uses a string as the payload
